title: Honoring John Ruhland and Tina Hawkinson of Red Cap Cleaners upon the occasion of their designation as recipients of the Next Generation Award
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring John Ruhland and Tina Hawkinson of Red
Cap Cleaners upon the occasion of their designation as recipients of the
Next Generation  Award  by  the  Dutchess  County  Regional  Chamber  of
Commerce

WHEREAS,  Individuals  who give of their time and energies and serve the
best interests of their communities are an asset beyond remuneration and
cannot be sufficiently extolled; and
  WHEREAS, John Ruhland and Tina Hawkinson have given not only of  their
time and energies but also of their competence, intelligence and leader-
ship and consequently have been designated for special honor; and
  WHEREAS,  This  Legislative Body is justly proud to honor John Ruhland
and Tina Hawkinson of Red Cap Cleaners upon the occasion of their desig-
nation as recipients of the Next Generation Award by the Dutchess County
Regional Chamber of Commerce, to be celebrated on February 5, 2011; and
  WHEREAS, This fine event is the Chamber's Le Cirque Des Affaires Annu-
al Gala which will be held at The Grandview in Poughkeepsie,  New  York;
and
  WHEREAS,  Pierrette  Ruhland  and  her  family  have owned the Red Cap
Cleaners for more than 30 years and  have  four  locations  in  Dutchess
County;  her  children,  John  Ruhland  and Tina Hawkinson, have assumed
leadership roles in the business and have made significant contributions
to its growth; and
  WHEREAS, Both Tina Hawkinson and John Ruhland worked in  the  business
as  teenagers; John has a Culinary Arts degree from The State University
of New York College of Agriculture and Technology at Cobleskill and  has
experience in the restaurant industry; Tina earned her Bachelor's degree
in Marketing from the Fashion Institute of Technology - State University
of New York (F.I.T.) and worked for 10 years in the retail industry; and
  WHEREAS,  The family is active supporting organizations, including the
Kiwanis  Club,  Poughkeepsie  Day  Nursery,  and  the  Center  for   the
Prevention  of Child Abuse; they are also active members of the Dutchess
County Regional Chamber of Commerce; and
  WHEREAS, Throughout the entire period of their  community  service,  a
period of constructive involvement, John Ruhland and Tina Hawkinson have
stood constant in dignity, good grace and humor; and
  WHEREAS, Rare indeed is the impressive dedication shown by individuals
for  the  benefit  of  others which John Ruhland and Tina Hawkinson have
displayed throughout their lives; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor John Ruhland and Tina Hawkinson of Red Cap Cleaners upon the occa-
sion  of their designation as recipients of the Next Generation Award by
the Dutchess County Regional Chamber of Commerce; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That copies of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to John Ruhland, Tina Hawkinson, and Pierrette Ruhland.
